name: One Night at Sesame Street+
description:
ONASS has made a return! Now the game is even more ca$h mon e. More characters, more story, more fun, and even more!

This is a Five Nights at Freddy's Fan Game!

Made using Scratch.

One day an experiment from the Religion of Egg failed, creating the what is known as the "ROE Puppets". They will try to kill you. Survive until 9 am to win, or do you?

It is recommended that you download the file since to continue the game after completing the normal mode you have to restart the game.

The game is still being worked on, so expect new or changed stuff soon.

Let me know about any glitches!

Play the original here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/508281125/

Play it on Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/onass/617694
